definition: four-substance decoction (si wu tang), tonic formula used in Chinese medicine
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: The developed method has been successfully applied in our study on Si-Wu-Tang.
sentences.chinese: 本研究在四物湯的研究中已經成功地運用了該方法。

sentences.english: Conclustion SWT and its effective position all can decrease blood viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 結論四物湯及其有效部位均可以顯著地降低全血粘度。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Siwu Decoction is safe and effective in asymptomatic myocardial ischemia.
sentences.chinese: 結論四物湯配方顆粒治療無症狀心肌缺血安全有效。

sentences.english: Objective To study hemorheology of SWT and its effective position.
sentences.chinese: 目的對四物湯及其有效部位進行血液流變學實驗研究。

sentences.english: The effects of Siwu decoction on mouse model with radiation injury were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 用四物湯對輻射損傷小鼠進行治療。

definition: eight-treasure decoction, tonic formula used in Chinese medicine
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
milk vetch/plant genus Astragalus/huangqi 黃芪|黄芪, Astragalus membranaceus (used in TCM)
to course the liver and rectify 氣|气[qi4] (TCM)
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
dodder (Cuscuta sinensis, a parasitic vine with seeds used in medicine)
donkey-hide gelatin (used in TCM)/Taiwan pr. [a1 jiao1]
to have a snack/to have a bite
